title: TikTok Profile
description: Strategically managed 8 TikTok accounts for various brands to enhance brand awareness and expand digital reach. Responsibilities included planning and creating engaging, brand-aligned content, regularly analyzing content performance, and leveraging current trends and TikTok algorithms to maximize engagement. Through a consistent and data-driven approach, successfully increased online visibility and strengthened the connection between brands and their target audiences on the TikTok platform.

title: Create Content
description: Responsible for developing and publishing engaging, relevant, and high-performing content across various social media platforms. Each piece of content was strategically crafted to capture audience attention, align with current trends, and reflect the unique identity of each brand. Several posts achieved view counts in the millions, demonstrating strong audience resonance and creative impact. The content creation process included trend research, scriptwriting, video editing, and optimized scheduling to ensure maximum reach and engagement at the most effective times.

title: TikTok Traffic
description: Successfully managed and optimized multiple social media accounts across TikTok (8 accounts) to enhance brand visibility and engagement. Developed and published compelling, high-performing content—some of which reached millions of views—by aligning creative strategies with platform trends and audience behavior. Maintained strong engagement metrics through consistent content monitoring and performance analysis. Continuously refined social media strategies to drive targeted traffic, strengthen brand connection, and improve overall conversion rates.

title: Facebook Profile
description: Effectively managed 4 business Facebook accounts to boost brand awareness and enhance online presence. Responsibilities included developing content strategies tailored to each brand, creating and scheduling engaging posts, monitoring audience insights, and optimizing performance based on analytics. By consistently aligning content with audience preferences and platform best practices, successfully increased visibility and strengthened brand engagement on Facebook.
